title: Unstable Ping/Disconnections
body:
Alright so ever since patch 7.2, I've been randomly disconnecting from games for about 10 secs and then everything will go back to normal for about 3 games and it'll happen again. Also my ping will be fine one game and then the next it will go up by 10 then the next it will return to normal then the next it'ell go up by 20, so on so on.

Thank you in advance for you suggestions and answers!

replies.body:
Unstable latency (ping) and disconnections are an indication that there's an issue between your PC and our servers. The first step to take is to ensure your local network settings are aligned with the settings we recommend in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Should you still experience these issues after taking the steps in the connection guide, let me know so we can further troubleshoot this together.
